text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- A conference on the impact of U.N. trade sanctions on Iraqis to be held in Spain.
- Vice-president Taha Mohieddin Ma'rouf meets in Rome with Sudanese leader.
- Washington puts the wording for the Gulf states' summit before it is held.
(The above stories were also carried by THAWRA)
